Fishing Guild Leader Santiago:
Such a good day to fish!
Though fishing is great any day and weather.
Oh, I'm sorry, I completely forgot to introduce myself. My name is Santiago, I am the new Fishing Guild Leader, but I used to be a simple fisherman who liked to sail out to the ocean and fish there.
Now you can have a chance to obtain Superior Seed Bracelet Lv.4 by using Star Sign. If you are interested, I can tell you more about Star Sign.

Have you heard about Agathion Fire Dragon and enhanced agathions?

If you bring me the Dragon Essence and 12 various enhanced agathions, I will give you Agathion Fire Dragon Charm. The Dragon Essence is obtained in exchange for Blessed Valakas' Necklace, Blessed Antharas' Earring and Lindvior's Earring.
